title: Watch: K Sivan Greeted With Applause Onboard Flight As The Humble ISRO Chief Flies Economy
text:
ISRO Chairman K Sivan won hearts all over the country after his team and him put in a lot of effort for the Chandrayaan-2 mission. Recently, the ISRO chief was recorded flying in economy class on an Indigo flight.

As K Sivan boarded the flight, the excited crew started taking selfies with him. The video of the incident went viral on social media. Also, hailing him for travelling in Economy class despite being the ISRO Chief, people on social media were proud of him.

The video shows K Sivan standing inside the airplane with the cabin crew posing for pictures with them as they are excited to see him. He also spoke to them, greeting them one by one and shaking hands with them. The cabin crew also welcomed him on the aircraft and thanked him for his kind gesture. K Sivan also got a round of applause from the passengers seated in the plane.

ISRO Chief K Sivan broke down in front of Prime Minister Narendra Modi as he was leaving the ISRO centre in Bengaluru at the time when entire nation went through a sleepless night as the Vikram lander started its descent toward the lunar south pole, but lost contact. The inconsolable senior scientist was hugged by the Prime Minister. The video of that incident also went viral on social media.
description: ISRO Chairman K Sivan won hearts of the country after all the people at ISRO had put so much hard work and the great efforts for the Chandrayaan-2 mission. Recently, the ISRO chief was recorded flying in economy class in a private airline, Indigo. As K Sivan boarded the flight, the excited crew started taking selfies with him.
